title: Mestre das Aguas
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Western, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Restaurant located on the shore where guests can sit out on the beach. The stereo plays reggae, dub, Brazilian, and Argentinian music. Candlelit tables in the evenings and live music some nights. Note that veg dishes are not clearly marked on the menus (different for daytime and night time), so ask your server. Includes a falafel sandwich, oven-baked vegetable spring roll, pizzas, pad Thai. Will accommodate vegetarians and vegans upon request.
streetAddress: Beira mar praia de Bombinhas, costao direito.
